name: Estate of Isaac Brownfield. Appeal of Brownfield, Trustees

judges: Before Sterrett, C. J., Green, McCollum:, Mitchell and Dean, JJ.
parties: Estate of Isaac Brownfield. Appeal of Brownfield, Trustees.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Mitchell,
For reasons given in tbe opinion in the same estate, January term, No. 279, ante, p. 151, the decree is reversed at the costs of the appellees.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Mitchell,

casebody.head_matter:
Estate of Isaac Brownfield. Appeal of Brownfield, Trustees.
Argued May 8, 1899.
Appeal, No. 280, Jan. T., 1898, by William W. and Isaac H. Brownfield, from decree of O. C. Fayette Co., Sept. T., 1895, No. 43, dismissing exceptions to auditor’s report.
Before Sterrett, C. J., Green, McCollum:, Mitchell and Dean, JJ.
Reversed.
October 6, 1899:
